summary_comment: Professor Goldberg-Miller is highly regarded for her comprehensive knowledge of the arts world and her ability to provide valuable feedback. Her classes are described as both enjoyable and entertaining, thanks to her engaging teaching style.
summary_comment_short: Professor Goldberg-Miller is highly regarded for her extensive knowledge of the arts world and her ability to make the subject matter engaging and enjoyable. Students find her classes both informative and entertaining, praising her for her insightful feedback and overall positive teaching quality.

Ratings.comment: Take her class if available! She is very knowledgeable about the arts world, and will give great feedback. She made the class enjoyable, and is funny!

summary_comment: Professor Catalano excels in one-on-one instruction but struggles with classroom teaching, failing to introduce new skills or materials during regular class sessions. Instead, classes primarily consisted of work days, and students only received guidance from her when specifically requesting help individually.
summary_comment_short: Professor Catalano excels in one-on-one settings but struggles with classroom instruction, failing to introduce new skills or materials during regular classes for the first month. Her approach primarily involves students working independently, with her providing guidance only when directly requested.

Ratings.comment: Tess on a 1 on 1 level is an amazing teacher, but she doesn't have the skills to teach a regular class. She literally didn't teach us any new skills or materials as a class since the first month of class. Every day we went to class was a "work day" she said. The only way she would teach us anything is if we asked her how to do something 1 on 1
